direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods provide information about the NodePosition object, with toString providing a string representation and node() returning the actual node.
Both methods provide information about the NodePosition object, with toString providing a string representation and position() returning the position value.
Both methods operate on the NodePosition object, with toString providing a string representation and nextPosition() returning a new NodePosition with an incremented position.
Both methods handle data conversion with similar control flows and exception handling, although serialize is more general and not specific to NodePosition.
